name: Vae Victis
description:
Overview

Welcome to Vae Victis, the minimalistic turn-based strategy game where you choose your faction, build your army, and crush your enemies to expand your empire. With intuitive turn-based combat, this game is easy to pick up but hard to master. Quickly form defensive lines and rapidly attack to claim victory!


Campaign

Start as a small kingdom and work to build a successful empire. Expand your borders while keeping a close eye on your enemies, who are always looking for an opportunity to strike. But war is not your only challenge; managing your economy and people is key to your success.

Multiplayer

Go head-to-head with your friends in custom battles and surprise them with your cunning Celtic archers, strong Roman swordsmen, or Hunnic cavalry maneuvers.

Custom Battles

Not in the mood for a full campaign? Start a custom battle, set your army and enemies, and deploy your strategy for a quick, intense battle.

Key Features

  • Intuitive Turn-Based Combat
    Most turn-based combat systems are slow and clunky, however in Vae Victis the combat is fast and dynamic. Quickly form defensive lines and rapidly attack!

  • Factions
    Choose from a variety of factions with their own special abilities and units to provide a twist to your strategy!

  • Units
    All units are created to fit their faction, with buffs and nerfs based on the factions' abilities. Making each battle unique.

  • Dynamic Combat
    Battle outcomes take into account a myriad of factors from unit position, to unit health to special abilities making each situation unique.
